shortdesc.ph: Reasons for a user role switch failure.

pd.p: 1: The number of hosts in the channel is already at the upper limit.
pd.note: This enumerator is reported only when the support for 128 users is enabled. The maximum number of hosts is based on the actual number of hosts configured when you enable the 128-user feature.

plentry.pd: 2: The request is rejected by the Agora server. Agora recommends you prompt the user to try to switch their user role again.
3: The request is timed out. Agora recommends you prompt the user to check the network connection and try to switch their user role again.
4: The SDK connection fails. You can use reason reported in the callback to troubleshoot the failure.
